original_text: The officer who ruled in Judah said that they must not eat the priests' special food. They must wait until there was a priest who could use the Urim and Thummim to decide the right thing to do. 7: The Urim and Thummim were special stones. God used them to show the priests what he wanted. The officer who ruled in Judah said that they must not eat the priests' special food. korean_text: 총독이 그들에게 명령하여 우림과 둠밈을 가진 제사장이 일어나기 전에는 지성물을 먹지 말라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The officer who ruled in Judah said
that they must not eat the priests' special food
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 제사장들의 특별한 음식을 먹지 말아야 한다고

to show the priests what he wanted
